entry.title: Baeldung/scala-tutorials

scala-tutorials

Code fomatting

Before creating a PR, make sure the code is correctly formatted running sbt scalafmt.

entry.title: yanns/play2-scala-DI
entry.summary:
play2-scala-DI

Technical prototyp to test different dependency injection solutions.

The target platform is:

  • Play framework v2
  • Scala

Tested:

  • Cake pattern
  • injection with implicits.
  • spring
